strings.ITEM_EXTRALIFEVOID_PICKUP: Gain an extra life in a <style=cIsVoid>new body</style>. Return to your <style=cIsHealth>original body</style> later. Consumed on use. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends.</style>.
strings.ITEM_EXTRALIFEVOID_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Upon death</style>, this item will be <style=cIsUtility>consumed</style> and you will <style=cIsHealing>return to life</style> with <style=cIsHealing>5 seconds of invulnerability</style> in a <style=cIsVoid>new body</style> that has <style=cIsHealth>-50% maximum health</style>. Return to your <style=cIsHealth>original body</style> in the next stage. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends</style>.
